channel.title: Pi attack/follow noclip. soul split
channel.description:
Ok when i attack some one. it runs through every ojbect in the game also with following. how can i make it so it doesnt no clip and it runs around and stuff.
soul split. how do i make soul split(smite) give you some hp randomly and you know when u summon monster it has that little ring. how do i make it do the gfx everytime it takes hp?
